plants.name: Monstera
plants.description: Monstera is a popular tropical plant known for its large, split leaves.

plants.name: Snake Plant
plants.description: The Snake Plant is a hardy, low-maintenance plant that can tolerate neglect.

plants.name: Spider Plant
plants.description: Spider plants are easy to care for and are known for their air-purifying qualities.

plants.name: Peace Lily
plants.description: Peace Lilies are elegant plants with white flowers and thrive in low light environments.
